summary: Comprehensive testing of Admin Panel and Blog features completed. All 27 backend API tests passed. Frontend testing: Admin login at /optimus, Dashboard with analytics, Blog Manager for CRUD operations, Public Blog page at /blog with SEO meta tags, category/tag filtering, and individual blog post pages with share functionality - all working correctly.

issues: React hydration warnings in console (non-blocking) - <span> cannot be child of <tbody>, <span> cannot be child of <select>

passed_tests: Backend - Admin login with correct credentials returns token
Backend - Admin login rejects wrong password
Backend - Admin login rejects wrong email
Backend - Admin token verification works
Backend - Admin verify rejects missing token
Backend - Admin verify rejects invalid token
Backend - Admin analytics returns all expected fields
Backend - Admin analytics requires authentication
Backend - Admin get all users works with pagination
Backend - Admin get all characters works
Backend - Public blog posts endpoint works
Backend - Blog posts pagination works
Backend - Blog categories endpoint works
Backend - Blog tags endpoint works
Backend - Admin create blog post works
Backend - Admin get all blog posts (including drafts) works
Backend - Admin update blog post works (including publish)
Backend - Admin get single blog post by ID works
Backend - Admin delete blog post works and verified
Backend - Duplicate slug correctly rejected
Backend - Public get published post by slug works
Backend - Draft posts not visible publicly
Backend - Nonexistent slug returns 404
Backend - Category filtering works
Backend - Tag filtering works
Backend - Related posts endpoint works
Frontend - Admin login page loads with correct elements
Frontend - Admin login with admin@admin.com / admin123 works
Frontend - Admin redirected to /optimus/dashboard after login
Frontend - Admin Dashboard shows analytics with stats cards
Frontend - Dashboard tabs (Analytics, Users, Characters, Blog) visible
Frontend - Navigate to Blog Manager via Blog tab
Frontend - Blog Manager shows list of posts with search
Frontend - New Post button opens editor
Frontend - Blog editor has all required fields (title, slug, content, SEO settings)
Frontend - Auto-generate slug from title works
Frontend - Save Draft button works
Frontend - Publish button visible
Frontend - Public Blog page loads at /blog
Frontend - Blog page shows published posts (2 posts)
Frontend - Search functionality filters posts
Frontend - Categories sidebar visible
Frontend - Tags section visible
Frontend - Navigate to individual blog post works
Frontend - Blog post SEO meta tags present (description, og:title, og:type, JSON-LD)
Frontend - Share button with Twitter, Facebook, LinkedIn, Copy Link options
Frontend - Category filtering via URL params works
critical_code_review_comments: React hydration warnings in AdminBlogEditor.js - <span> elements wrapped around dynamic content inside <table> and <select>. Not blocking but should be fixed for clean console.
SEO implementation using native document.title and meta tag manipulation works correctly
JSON-LD structured data for blog posts is properly implemented
seed_data_creation: 2 sample blog posts already exist in database: '10 Tips for Meaningful AI Conversations' (Tips & Tricks) and 'Getting Started with AI Companions: A Complete Guide' (Guides)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Admin panel fully functional at /optimus with login. Dashboard shows analytics (17 users, 25 characters, 63 messages, etc). Blog Manager at /optimus/blog allows CRUD on posts. Public blog at /blog shows published posts with SEO tags, categories, tags, search, and share functionality. Admin token stored in localStorage after login.
